titles: Irelands advocate: or, A sermon preached upon Novem. 14, 1641. to promote the contributions by way of lending, for the present reliefe of the Protestants party in Ireland. In the parrish church of St. Stephens Coleman Street London, by the pastor there.
author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
publisher: Printed for William Larnar, and are to be sold at his Shop, at the signe of the Golden Anchor, neere Paules-Chaine,
notes: The pastor of the parish church of St. Stephens = John Goodwin-- Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  John, 1st, III, 16 --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
